page.title: 14SAFARI PARK
page.content: {KNOWSLEY SAFARI PARK.}This park is run by {CHIPPERFIELD}in partnership with the 18'th {EARL of DERBY. }There are 450 acres of enclosures.Each species has its own enclosure.In all there are 36 species,about 370 animals and the visitors total about 450,000 each year.The tour is about 5 miles long.There are some of the biggest African mammals which include {elephants,giraffes,buffaloes,and {hippos.}As well there are many {cheetahs}which have had to be kept in a pen near the roadside because they roamed to freely and got lost in the long grass.There is also a { {DOLPHINARIUM }in the park. There are good amenities for visitors consisting of a bar,a cafeteria,a snack bar and kiosk.A picnic area has also been pprovided.
